summary: This is an email chain from June 13-14, 2019, between prosecutors discussing a draft indictment against Jeffrey Epstein. The discussion centers on balancing the need to make the indictment sufficiently detailed to convey the case's seriousness and support a press conference, against the need to protect victim identities and preserve investigative details for witness vetting.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Referenced as the person who will speak at a press conference about the case and needs material to convey its seriousness.
